# An Introduction

## 1. Installation

You can install **nonnest2** from [CRAN](http://cran.rstudio.com/package=nonnest2), if you want to test the latest development version:

```{r eval=FALSE}
install.packages('nonnest2', repos = 'http://cran.rstudio.com')

# to install the development version, run
# library(devtools)
# install_github("qpsy/nonnest2")
```
